article_title: McCrory defends DHHS chief after agency's latest misstep
article_text: Gov. Pat McCrory said Monday he supports state DHHS Secretary Aldona Wos after her agency violated federal health privacy rules when nearly 50,000 children's health insurance cards were sent to incorrect addresses.

article_metadata.news-keywords: Pat McCrory, Aldona Wos, DHHS, Medicaid cards, privacy breach
